attributes.action: An Eye for an Eye, Hang them All #PESHAWARATTACK
attributes.additional_details:
Mr. Prime Minister of United Kingdom.

We don't need statements from you, your party leaders nor from any other leaders. Stop giving these sorry statements we simply don't need it. Within this week announce handing of 500+ terrorists under Pakistani jails and hang them publicly. We don't need your wordy statements, NO SIR, NO more of them. The whole nation is asking for one thing "Public Hanging of the arrested terrorists who have been charged guilty.

Dear brothers and sister our slogan for the campaign against the terrorism, the terrorists responsible for such barbaric acts and the Armed Forces should be
"An Eye for an Eye, Hang them All, Hang them High".

Please be a part of this protest.
